node._chi_workshop_name: ChiRunning Half-day Workshop June 15, San Francisco
node.title: 06/15/19 ChiRunning Workshop, Hazel Wood
node._chi_workshop_description:
As a Master Instructor with 15 years experience teaching ChiRunning, Hazel Wood will teach you how to run with more ease and energy and prevent injury and give you lots of tips so that you can improve and enjoy your running more. You'll enjoy a rich learning experience, get lots of personal attention and have fun. This class is for anyone - beginners who want to start off “right”, seasoned runners who want to increase distance or speed, triathletes looking to improve the run portion, or if you’re just tired of being injured. The workshop meets indoors in The Grotto, Level 1 at Sports Basement. It will be held both indoors and outdoors – rain or shine so dress accordingly. Bring water, sunscreen and any snacks you may need. Video gait analysis is included. You will also receive a set of materials to assist you with continued learning and practice. Workshop Description You will get lots of personal attention and enjoy a rich learning experience packed with good information to help you run injury-free for the rest of your life. The Chi Running Essentials workshop includes several hours of instruction in a single 1/2 day course. Hazel will be guiding you through many exercises and drills designed to leave you with a clear sense of what the Chi Running technique feels like in your body. We will not be doing lots of running (contrary to what you might imagine), so no matter what condition you are in, have no fear. We will spend time alternating between demonstrations, fun exercises and technique drills ... the nature of the day will be relaxed, full and inspiring.
  • The Keys to Effortless, Injury-free Running
  • The Physics of Running: Run without Using Your Legs
  • Chi Running versus Power Running
  • Introduction to the Chi Running Form
  • Injury prevention techniques
  • Personal Check-in Tricks and Tools
  • Core Muscle Drills and Exercises
  • Pre-run Body Looseners, Post-run Stretches
  • Innovative technique drills
  • How to conserve energy at any speed
I invite you to contact me with any questions hazel@stridebystride.com A bit about Hazel .... she's been running for a long time and teaching ChiRunning for a long time (since 2004).  She has run races from 1 mile to 50 miles and loves the trails. Learn more about Hazel and her services on her website stridebystride.com
node._chi_workshop_custom_refund_policy:
Cancellation Policy

Cancel 10 days before the workshop and you will be refunded $130 (there is a $10 processing fee), or you can use the $140 for a future workshop purchased through Stride By Stride within one year with no penalty. If you cancel within 10 days of the workshop, you will not receive a refund, but the full fee can be credited towards a future workshop purchased through Stride By Stride within one year. If you cancel within two days of the workshop you forfeit your full payment. The Instructor reserves the right to cancel/reschedule the workshop (e.g. weather conditions or if group minimum of 3 people is not reached), in which case you will receive a full refund.
node._chi_workshop_testimonialsquote00value:
I just wanted to say a big “thank you” for yesterday’s class. I really enjoyed it and look forward to practicing the new teachings. I particularly appreciated your effective teaching style. You didn’t waste a moment and seeing as the class lasted over four hours, I think that’s a significant achievement. Thank you so much.
Edwin
node._chi_workshop_testimonialsquote10value:
Thanks so much for all your wonderful information Hazel. I went on a 4 mile run yesterday (the first since our workshop), 1/2 pavement, 1/2 trail and it was exhilirating, easy! and just felt so wonderful. 4 miles for me was a "big run" a week ago...this time it felt effortless....
Again thank you. I look forward to continue to educate myself with your tools.
Meghan Krick
node._chi_workshop_testimonialsquote20value:
I wanted to let you know that today Jennifer and I went for a 6 mile run and I was really focusing on:
  1. holding my arms at 90 degrees and using my arms
  2. falling forward slightly
  3. visualizing the parasail method, alternating with the ground moving towards me
  4. focusing on someone or something in the distance
And, guess what?  I had one of the best runs ever!  I had a record time for the route too!  I admit I was a bit of a skeptic on the Chi technique, but think I’m sold now!  I can’t wait for my next run.  So, thank you! Karin

node.title: ChiRunning Workshop - June 30, 2019 - Marc Waxman
node.excerpt: Come learn ChiRunning with Coach Marc's special approach honed through years of teaching experience!
node._chi_workshop_additional_date_details: This is a great location with easy access and easy parking with a great outdoor running trail as well as great indoor space.
node._chi_workshop_description:
Please email Coach Marc at coachmarc113@gmail.com to register.

Running Never Felt this Good! Is this the workshop for me? Yes! Runners of all capabilities will benefit from this workshop, from beginners to seasoned marathoners and elites. What Your Workshop Includes:
  • Learn to Run Injury- Free Leave knee pain, IT- Band Syndrome, and other aches and pains in the dust. In this workshop you’ll learn how, and why, ChiRunning works.
  • Run Farther and Faster with Less Effort Streamline your running by using your energy wisely. With good body mechanics, relaxation and breathing techniques, you’ll learn how to prevent fatigue, improve your endurance, and gain speed.
  • Tips to Train Your Best Whether you’re training for a marathon or your first 5K, ChiRunning will help you master your next race and minimize recovery time.
  • Plenty of Practice You’ll practice running drills and exercises designed to help you instill the technique in your body.
Learn more about Marc at www.113enterprises.com.
node._chi_workshop_testimonialsquote00value:
Having Marc Waxman as my ChiRunning coach has changed my life!! Marc is an amazing teacher and has taught me how to run injury free!!  This was not easy since I was a true heel striker which caused me to have four tibial stress fractures in three years while trying to train for the marathon.​

After my fourth stress fracture where my doctors ruled out causes due to bone density or vitamin D levels since all the test showed great results, the consensus was that I needed to relearn how to run!!​

Research led me to ChiRunning and most importantly, Marc Waxman!  At my first ChiRunning workshop I was amazed at Marc’s ability to teach.  I was not surprised to learn he had a teaching background.  Marc has helped me to learn how to run effectively and efficiently through guided runs and having me think about “form focuses” which he includes in my online training plan.​

This past week I got a chance to use my training in the Providence Marathon.  I came away injury free with a PR!  A win win for me thanks to Marc and all his guidance.  My goal is to Boston Qualify and although I did not achieve that on this attempt, I am confident that Marc will get me there!  “I can and I will” is my motto but in reality I couldn’t come close without Marc!

​I am looking forward to beginning another training cycle of guided runs with Marc along with ChiRunning “form focuses” on the Final Surge training plan.  I know I’ll enjoy the challenge and like implementing and practicing the ChiRunning form on my runs.  I truly believe Marc is the reason I am now finally able to run injury free.  His ability to teach the ChiRunning technique along with smart coaching is crucial to my success as a runner.

​-Donna C.

55 year old marathon runner :)

node._chi_workshop_name: ChiRunning Free Mini-clinic @ Marathon Sports in Mansfield
node.title: June 26, 2019 - ChiRunning Miniclinic - Marc Waxman
node.excerpt: Discounts to Marc's upcoming workshops for all participants!
node._chi_workshop_description:
Free ChiRunning Mini Workshop with Senior Certifying ChiRunning/ChiWalking Instructor Marc Waxman

DISCOUNTS TO UPCOMING CHIRUNNING WORKSHOPS FOR ALL PARTICIPANTS!

 

A complimentary ChiRunning mini-workshop with Marc Waxman.  ChiRunning is a natural running technique, aimed to reduce injury and improve personal performance.  ChiRunning takes its guidance from the inner design of T’ai Chi which asks us to move the body in a natural order, where the big muscles do the heavy lifting, the smaller muscles do less and the tiniest muscles do very little.  The mission of ChiRunning is to help you LOVE running forever.

 

About Marc

Marc is an avid runner with regular podium finishes.  In his forties he ran a 2:51 PR in the Boston Marathon and successfully completed 50-mile ultramarathons.  Marc has been practicing ChiRunning for many years and credits it for his ability to run 2,500 injury-free miles every year.  

Learn more about Coach Marc at www.113enterprises.com

Research led me to ChiRunning and most importantly, Marc Waxman!  At my first ChiRunning workshop I was amazed at Marc’s ability to teach.  I was not surprised to learn he had a teaching background.  Marc has helped me to learn how to run effectively and efficiently through guided runs and having me think about “form focuses” which he includes in my online training plan.​

This past week I got a chance to use my training in the Providence Marathon.  I came away injury free with a PR!  A win win for me thanks to Marc and all his guidance.  My goal is to Boston Qualify and although I did not achieve that on this attempt, I am confident that Marc will get me there!  “I can and I will” is my motto but in reality I couldn’t come close without Marc!​

-Donna C.

55 year old marathon runner :)

node._chi_workshop_name: ChiRunning Half-day Workshop July 13, San Francisco
node.title: 07/13/19 ChiRunning Workshop, Hazel Wood
node._chi_workshop_description:
As a Master Instructor with 15 years experience teaching ChiRunning, Hazel Wood will teach you how to run with more ease and energy and prevent injury and give you lots of tips so that you can improve and enjoy your running more. You'll enjoy a rich learning experience, get lots of personal attention and have fun. This class is for anyone - beginners who want to start off “right”, seasoned runners who want to increase distance or speed, triathletes looking to improve the run portion, or if you’re just tired of being injured. The workshop meets indoors in The Grotto, Level 1 at Sports Basement. It will be held both indoors and outdoors – rain or shine so dress accordingly. Bring water, sunscreen and any snacks you may need. Video gait analysis is included. You will also receive a set of materials to assist you with continued learning and practice. Workshop Description You will get lots of personal attention and enjoy a rich learning experience packed with good information to help you run injury-free for the rest of your life. The Chi Running Essentials workshop includes several hours of instruction in a single 1/2 day course. Hazel will be guiding you through many exercises and drills designed to leave you with a clear sense of what the Chi Running technique feels like in your body. We will not be doing lots of running (contrary to what you might imagine), so no matter what condition you are in, have no fear. We will spend time alternating between demonstrations, fun exercises and technique drills ... the nature of the day will be relaxed, full and inspiring.
  • The Keys to Effortless, Injury-free Running
  • The Physics of Running: Run without Using Your Legs
  • Chi Running versus Power Running
  • Introduction to the Chi Running Form
  • Injury prevention techniques
  • Personal Check-in Tricks and Tools
  • Core Muscle Drills and Exercises
  • Pre-run Body Looseners, Post-run Stretches
  • Innovative technique drills
  • How to conserve energy at any speed
I invite you to contact me with any questions hazel@stridebystride.com A bit about Hazel .... she's been running for a long time and teaching ChiRunning for a long time (since 2004).  She has run races from 1 mile to 50 miles and loves the trails. Learn more about Hazel and her services on her website stridebystride.com
node._chi_workshop_custom_refund_policy:
Cancellation Policy

Cancel 10 days before the workshop and you will be refunded $130 (there is a $10 processing fee), or you can use the $140 for a future workshop purchased through Stride By Stride within one year with no penalty. If you cancel within 10 days of the workshop, you will not receive a refund, but the full fee can be credited towards a future workshop purchased through Stride By Stride within one year. If you cancel within two days of the workshop you forfeit your full payment. The Instructor reserves the right to cancel/reschedule the workshop (e.g. weather conditions or if group minimum of 3 people is not reached), in which case you will receive a full refund.
node._chi_workshop_testimonialsquote00value:
I just wanted to say a big “thank you” for yesterday’s class. I really enjoyed it and look forward to practicing the new teachings. I particularly appreciated your effective teaching style. You didn’t waste a moment and seeing as the class lasted over four hours, I think that’s a significant achievement. Thank you so much.
Edwin
node._chi_workshop_testimonialsquote10value:
Thanks so much for all your wonderful information Hazel. I went on a 4 mile run yesterday (the first since our workshop), 1/2 pavement, 1/2 trail and it was exhilirating, easy! and just felt so wonderful. 4 miles for me was a "big run" a week ago...this time it felt effortless....
Again thank you. I look forward to continue to educate myself with your tools.
Meghan Krick
node._chi_workshop_testimonialsquote20value:
I wanted to let you know that today Jennifer and I went for a 6 mile run and I was really focusing on:
  1. holding my arms at 90 degrees and using my arms
  2. falling forward slightly
  3. visualizing the parasail method, alternating with the ground moving towards me
  4. focusing on someone or something in the distance
And, guess what?  I had one of the best runs ever!  I had a record time for the route too!  I admit I was a bit of a skeptic on the Chi technique, but think I’m sold now!  I can’t wait for my next run.  So, thank you! Karin

node.title: ChiRunning - July 28, 2019 - Marc Waxman
node.excerpt: That's right - a ChiRunning workshop on-Island!
node._chi_workshop_additional_date_details: This workshop will sell out. Register early!
node._chi_workshop_description:
Please email Coach Marc at coachmarc113@gmail.com to register.

Running Never Felt this Good! Is this the workshop for me? Yes! Runners of all capabilities will benefit from this workshop, from beginners to seasoned marathoners and elites. What Your Workshop Includes:
  • Learn to Run Injury- Free Leave knee pain, IT- Band Syndrome, and other aches and pains in the dust. In this workshop you’ll learn how, and why, ChiRunning works.
  • Run Farther and Faster with Less Effort Streamline your running by using your energy wisely. With good body mechanics, relaxation and breathing techniques, you’ll learn how to prevent fatigue, improve your endurance, and gain speed.
  • Tips to Train Your Best Whether you’re training for a marathon or your first 5K, ChiRunning will help you master your next race and minimize recovery time.
  • Plenty of Practice You’ll practice running drills and exercises designed to help you instill the technique in your body.
Learn more about Marc at www.113enterprises.com.

After my fourth stress fracture where my doctors ruled out causes due to bone density or vitamin D levels since all the test showed great results, the consensus was that I needed to relearn how to run!!​

55 year old marathon runner :)

node.title: 11/17/19-ChiRunning Clinic-Sarah Richardson
node.excerpt: Learn more about Sarah Richardson at www.riseandshine.run
node._chi_workshop_additional_date_details: VCIH is at the top of Main Street in the old NECI building.
node._chi_workshop_description:
Workshop Description In this workshop you will learn the basic components of the Chi Running technique and how to implement it in your body. We will be guiding you through many exercises and drills designed to leave you with a clear sense of what the Chi Running technique feels like in your body. We will not be doing lots of running (contrary to what you might imagine), so no matter what condition you're in, have no fear. We will spend the day alternating between demonstrations, fun exercises and technique drills... the nature of the day will be relaxed, full, and inspiring.

Outline for the Day: 

Morning Session

  • The Keys to Effortless, Injury-free Running
  • The Physics of Running: Run without Using Your Legs
  • Introduction to the Chi Running Form
  • Posture
  • Leading with your Dantien
  • ChWalking
  • Arm Swing
  • Stride Length/Leaning to Use Your Gears
  • Cadence
  • Personal Check-in Tricks and Tools
  • Core Muscle Drills and Exercise
Lunch: Conversation over lunch as we answer your questions

Afternoon Session

  • Putting it all Together
  • ChiRunning
  • Pre-run Body Looseners, Post-run Stretches
  • Hills
  • Personal Check-in Tricks and Tools
  • Core Muscle Drills and Exercises
  • Your 3 Main Focuses Clarified!
Notes We will have a combo of indoor and outdoor time, so please bring appropriate clothing (layers). Feel free to bring water, light lunch and/or a snack.
node._chi_workshop_testimonialsquote00value: Nailed My Form. I was so excited to find ChiRunning. Getting back into running as an adult was a little scary and I didn't know if I was doing it quite right. I did not have the time for pain, injuries or being out of commission, yet wanted to get back into shape... safely.  Sarah has helped me nail my form before injuries could crop up and I haven't looked back. She taught how to move my body with proper form and how to listen to my body.  I'm so glad that I can run with my friends and have been able to safely compete in races I never thought I could do!   ~Andrea
node._chi_workshop_testimonialsquote10value: Check. Check. Being a busy working mom, I wanted an activity I could do on the fly and I chose running. But I hadn't ever been a runner before. ChiRunning was the perfect place to start. Sarah helped me stay safe and sound while I trained for my first race ever, which was a half-marathon! As a teacher, she was extremely patient and made it so understandable and I could actually FEEL if I was doing it right or wrong. I'm so glad that I took the time to learn my form, it made all the the difference in the world.   ~Maureen

node._chi_workshop_name: ChiRunning: Pre Training for the YMCA MONTCLAIR 10K!
node.title: 05/28/19 ChiRunning Workshop Joel Matalon
node._chi_workshop_description:
Rock ? the YMCA MONTCLAIR 10K!

CHOREOGRAPH YOUR BEST RUN Joel Matalon will guide you on the principles of ChiRunning and the RUNhabX™ (RUNning Habits for X-ordinary Performance) based form and technique on the course itself. $35 must be paid by Fri, May 24th Minimum 5 paid participants needed.

node.title: 07/14/19 ChiRunning Lisa Pozzoni
node._chi_workshop_venue: Residence in Dobson Ranch in Mesa (Guadalupe/Dobson)
node._chi_workshop_description:
I will guide you through many exercises and drills designed to leave you with a clear sense of what the Chi Running technique feels like in your body.  You will learn: Posture, Foot Placement, Lean, Arm Swing, Knee Bending, Stride Length, Cadence and more.  You will also be videotaped at the beginning of the workshop.  We will not be doing lots of running (contrary to what you might imagine), so no matter what condition you are in, have no fear. We will spend time alternating between demonstrations, fun exercises and technique drills … the nature of the day will be relaxed, full and inspiring. This workshop is appropriate for everyone, from the beginner to the elite!
  • The Keys to Effortless, Injury-free Running
  • The Physics of Running: Run without Using Your Legs
  • Chi Running versus Power Running
  • Introduction to the Chi Running Form
  • Injury prevention techniques
  • Personal Check-in Tricks and Tools
  • Core Muscle Drills and Exercises
  • Pre-run Body Looseners, Post-run Stretches
  • Innovative technique drills
  • How to conserve energy at any speed
  • Video Analysis of your form at the beginning of class
  • This investment will out weigh the hassle/money/time off that you would deal with a running injury! Prevention vs. Treatment!
node._chi_workshop_testimonialsquote00value: The ChiRunning Essentials class costs as much as a new pair of running shoes and you will get a lot more out of the class. I started running in my last 40’s and realized, after I got hurt, that I should have worked on my running form. The classes are a great way to evaluate and improve your form. If I had taken the class before I hurt my knee, I think the injury would not have happened. I have recommended the workshops to several friends.

node.title: 06/23/19 ChiRunning Lisa Pozzoni - Clone
node._chi_workshop_venue: Residence in Dobson Ranch in Mesa (Guadalupe/Dobson)
node._chi_workshop_description:
I will guide you through many exercises and drills designed to leave you with a clear sense of what the Chi Running technique feels like in your body.  You will learn: Posture, Foot Placement, Lean, Arm Swing, Knee Bending, Stride Length, Cadence and more.  You will also be videotaped at the beginning of the workshop.  We will not be doing lots of running (contrary to what you might imagine), so no matter what condition you are in, have no fear. We will spend time alternating between demonstrations, fun exercises and technique drills … the nature of the day will be relaxed, full and inspiring. This workshop is appropriate for everyone, from the beginner to the elite!
  • The Keys to Effortless, Injury-free Running
  • The Physics of Running: Run without Using Your Legs
  • Chi Running versus Power Running
  • Introduction to the Chi Running Form
  • Injury prevention techniques
  • Personal Check-in Tricks and Tools
  • Core Muscle Drills and Exercises
  • Pre-run Body Looseners, Post-run Stretches
  • Innovative technique drills
  • How to conserve energy at any speed
  • Video Analysis of your form at the beginning of class
  • This investment will out weigh the hassle/money/time off that you would deal with a running injury! Prevention vs. Treatment!
node._chi_workshop_testimonialsquote00value: The ChiRunning Essentials class costs as much as a new pair of running shoes and you will get a lot more out of the class. I started running in my last 40’s and realized, after I got hurt, that I should have worked on my running form. The classes are a great way to evaluate and improve your form. If I had taken the class before I hurt my knee, I think the injury would not have happened. I have recommended the workshops to several friends.

node.title: 06/22/19 ChiRunning Lisa Pozzoni
node._chi_workshop_venue: Residence in Dobson Ranch in Mesa (Guadalupe/Dobson)
node._chi_workshop_description:
Summer is a great time to deepen your running practice and get prepared for those fall races. This a perfect program for any ChiRunner wanting a good review of all the form focuses or someone wanting to learn the ChiRunning technique and get lots of practice. (LIMIT 8 PEOPLE) We will be following the 6 Week ChiRunning Injury-Free Intermediate 5K plan. Once plan is purchased via Final Surge, you will have a free athlete account.  Week 1: Lesson: Posture Goal: Get Aligned, Feel Aligned Week 2: Lesson: Engage your Core Goal: Moving from your Center Week 3: Lesson: Lean Goal: Engage Gravity & Cadence Week 4: Lesson: Lower Body Goal: The Passive Lower Leg: Foot Placement, Stride Length Week 5: Lesson: Upper Body Goal: Have your Upper Body Join the Fun! Week 6: Lesson: Upper Body & Lower Body Goal: Put it all together! Included in fee: Facebook Group: A place for all participants to share experiences, ask questions, stay accountable to the 6 week plan. Access to my TRU Workout Portal which includes strength training and stretching routines: Get access to strength training workouts and stretching routines for runners. These include a variety of workouts from corrective exercise, to strength training, foam rolling, etc. I have pre approved all the workouts and they are easy to follow with videos. Weekly Technique Training and Running: We will meet weekly. I will teach the material for the week and then we will run for 30 minutes practicing while I’ll be coaching participants individually.  Saturdays 6/22-7/27 from 6-7am Video Analysis- I will video record participants at the group workouts in Week 1. I will send those videos to you online with my comments so you will always have something to review.
$129 First Timers $99 Alumni
node._chi_workshop_testimonialsquote00value: "The ChiRunning Essentials class costs as much as a new pair of running shoes and you will get a lot more out of the class. I started running in my last 40’s and realized, after I got hurt, that I should have worked on my running form. The classes are a great way to evaluate and improve your form. If I had taken the class before I hurt my knee, I think the injury would not have happened. I have recommended the workshops to several friends." ~ Charles

node._chi_workshop_name: Instructor Training– Home Study & 4-day Immersive Program
node.title: CRCWIT | Hong Kong, China | 10/02/19 - 10/05/19 | Harrison Wong
node._chi_workshop_additional_date_details: Register By: July 15, 2019 | 4-day Immersive Program: October 2-5
node._chi_workshop_description:
Become a ChiRunning Certified Instructor to help others to enjoy running injury-free and effortlessly; treat ChiRunning as your career and your mission by promoting this revolutionary running system to benefit more people. The ChiRunning Instructor Certification System has been continuously improved and improved over the past two decades, ensuring the integrity of each instructor and becoming a dual affirmation of running skills and training proficiency. Take immediate action, join the ranks of professional coaches!
Fee inclusive of:
  • Instructor Manual
  • 3 ChiRunning books, 2 DVDs, 1 Metronome
  • 4 days practical training camp (with daily complimentary lunch and coffee break)
  • Certificate of completion
  • 1 ChiRunning Instructor Tee
node._chi_workshop_custom_refund_policy: Cancellation Policy: 30 days before final registration date (same date that Home-study begins): Full refund, minus $250 cancellation fee.

node._chi_workshop_name: Instructor Training– Home Study & 4-day Immersive Program
node.title: CRCWIT | Freiburg, Germany | 10/31/19 - 11/3/19 | Bernhard Schittich
node._chi_workshop_additional_date_details: Register By: August 12, 2019 | 4-day Immersive Program: October 21-November 2, 2019
node._chi_workshop_description:
Use this extraordinary opportunity in a wonderful atmosphere to lay the foundation for your lifelong ChiRunning practice and start your own business. ChiRunning has a lot of potential and is becoming more and more popular in German-speaking countries. Become part of our great team, we need good instructors to serve the demand! As a certified instructor, runners help overcome pain, make running injuries history, and find their own center. This is a contribution to a better world. And you yourself are technically always on the ball through the teaching and you will understand a little better with each course, why the Raramuri say "running is controlled falling" The end:
  • Registration by 12th August 2019 at the latest
  • Three-month self-study of the teaching materials, including first teaching
  • Workshop from 31.10. until 03.11. 2019 in Freiburg
  • Practice: teaching, recording videos of teaching and running
  • Submit the documents
  • certification
Register by email: mail@running-moments.de.
node._chi_workshop_custom_refund_policy: Cancellation Policy: 30 days before final registration date (same date that Home-study begins): Full refund, minus $250 cancellation fee.

node._chi_workshop_name: Instructor Training– Home Study & 4-day Immersive Program
node.title: CRCWIT | London, England | 11/07/19 - 11/10/19 | Gray Caws
node._chi_workshop_additional_date_details: Register By: July 7, 2019 | 4-day Immersive Program: November 7-10, 2019
node._chi_workshop_venue: The Adventures Studio @ One Yoga London
node._chi_workshop_description:
Do you love to run? Would you love to share that passion with others? The ChiRunning Instructor Training Programme will help you hone your running technique, and provide you with the skillset to coach others.

As a qualified ChiRunning Instructor you will enjoy a wonderful business opportunity, becoming part of a growing network dedicated to inspiring and empowering runners of all levels. The Programme comprises…
  • Access to a comprehensive online training course and teaching materials
  • A 4-day practical workshop covering advanced technique and teacher training
  • 2 one-to-one sessions with the UK director, delivered online or in-person
The Programme delivers…
  • An in-depth understanding of the key principles and components of the ChiRunning technique
  • The teaching cues, drills and exercises to teach ChiRunning lessons including posture, breathing, video observation, hill running, speed with ease, training programme development
  • An understanding of basic anatomy and physiology including an overview of the kinetic chain, muscle sling systems and myofascial meridians
  • An understanding of the importance of, and science behind, a mindful approach to exercise
  • An introduction to basic business development and connection to the network of world-wide ChiRunning Instructors
  • The opportunity to improve your own personal practice
node._chi_workshop_custom_refund_policy: Cancellation Policy: 30 days before final registration date (same date that Home-study begins): Full refund, minus $250 cancellation fee.
